name: Don't be Soup!
description:
Controls:

Keyboard & Mouse:

  • WASD / Arrow Keys to walk
  • Move Mouse to aim
  • Hold Left mouse button to shoot

Controller (recommended):

  • Left Joystick to walk
  • Right Joystick to shoot

Everything in the game is made by me, except for the background music, which I picked from https://freesound.org/people/NightWolfCFM/sounds/464311/ shortly before the end of the game jam.
